$Default Time No Limit(1.02) [NeilHarbin0]
043D4A48 00340000

$Display Ungrabbable Hurtboxes [UnclePunch,NeilHarbin0]
*Displays hurtboxes that do not interact with grab boxes in an off-yellow color
*Modified by NeilHarbin0 to change hurtbox color

$Disable Yoshi's Background [NeilHarbin0]
*Only disables cardboard box, not waves and islands
041e307c 60000000

$Disable FoD tree, halos, background coloring
041cbbd4 60000000 #Disable tree, halos, background coloring
041cbf54 60000000 #Disable various background boxes that appear due to the disable tree line

*ID 0 = Red, ID 1 = Green, ID 2 = Blue, ID 3 = Purple
